## Downloads

| Platform | Download |
|----------|----------|
| macOS (Tahoe+) | [astrum_macos_tahoe+_universal_VERSION.dmg](https://github.com/astrum-chat/astrum/releases/download/VERSION/astrum_macos_tahoe+_universal_VERSION.dmg) |
| macOS (Sequoia+) | [astrum_macos_sequoia+_universal_VERSION.dmg](https://github.com/astrum-chat/astrum/releases/download/VERSION/astrum_macos_sequoia+_universal_VERSION.dmg) |
| Linux | [astrum_linux_VERSION.AppImage](https://github.com/astrum-chat/astrum/releases/download/VERSION/astrum_linux_VERSION.AppImage) |
| Windows | [astrum_windows_VERSION.exe](https://github.com/astrum-chat/astrum/releases/download/VERSION/astrum_windows_VERSION.exe) |

## Installation

### macOS
1. Download the `.dmg` file for your architecture.
2. Open the `.dmg` and drag Astrum to your Applications folder.
3. Run the `xattr -cr /Applications/Astrum.app` command in the terminal to unquarantine the app.

### Linux
1. Download the `.AppImage` file.
2. Make it executable: `chmod +x astrum_linux_VERSION.AppImage`.
3. Run it: `./astrum_linux_VERSION.AppImage`.

### Windows
1. Download the `.exe` file.
2. Run it directly, no installation required.
